name: Chillin'
description:
This project is an entrance for Indie Game Dev Beginners #002

A nostalgic retro platformer created in collaboration by a developer and a 3d modeller/animator that live in opposing time zones but sharing the same passion!! gg we made it!!

ABILITIES - CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Left Shift

(Double) Jump - (Double) Space

Climbing - Approaching objects and seeing if they're climbable ;)

Reset - R

CREDITS:

Modelling + animation of the player, modelling of the retro room interior and the cassette collectible - https://itch.io/profile/krispdi

Game development, level design and game design - https://itch.io/profile/ohnomonday

PSX assets used created by - https://elbolilloduro.itch.io/

BGM - https://rustedstudio.itch.io/
